games.title: MR RACER - Car Racing
games.description:
MR Racer puts you in the driver's seat of blazing-fast supercars as you race through chaotic streets, dodge traffic, and conquer fierce racing challenges. With over 100 thrilling missions, limitless chase levels, and a full-fledged career mode, it‚Äôs time to test your reflexes and racing instincts.

Customize and upgrade your rides to stay ahead of the curve. Choose from eye-catching paint jobs, cool wheels, and performance boosts to dominate every track.
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready to hit the streets with MR Racer, where thrilling action unfolds with stylish cars. Race at high speed with stunning supercars and beat the traffic. 
This game provides a very easy-to-control car movement and is extremely fun to race.

Features:

100 levels in Challenge Mode. Let‚Äôs see how many you can complete!
Unlimited levels in Chase Mode. Best of race, chase your opponents and show them that you are a Master!
Career Race Mode: Beat your rivals and be the legend!
15 Supercars available
Upgrade cars to gear up the performance!
Customize cars with attractive car paint and cool wheels
Stunning 3D graphics & realistic lighting
Different Camera angles: First-person view, third-person view, and top-down view
5 realistic locations: Farmland, City, Mountain Day, Mountain Night, and Snow
6 game modes: Challenge mode, Career mode, Chase mode, Endless, Time Trial, and Free ride
Automatic or Manual acceleration option
Engaging and intelligent traffic system
Encouragement from Maria!



Controls:
W / up arrow key = accelerate
A / left arrow key = steer left
D / right arrow key = steer right
S / down arrow key = brake
H = horn

games.title: Car Smash Simulator: Crash & Tune
games.description:
Welcome to the ultimate car crash simulator!

Smash, crash, and customize your vehicles in a giant open-world sandbox. Experience realistic damage - watch doors fly off, hoods crumple, and wheels pop off in brutal crashes.

Drive through zones packed with destruction tools:
- Giant hammers
- Hydraulic crushers
- Mega ramps and more

Discover new cars roaming the world and make each one yours with tuning:
- Change full body color or individual parts
- Adjust wheel size, height, and camber
- Style your ride your way

Whether you're here to break stuff, perform insane stunts, or just roam free - it's your playground of metal and madness.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:
WASD - drive
Space - handbrake
Shift - nitro
Tab - pause
C - camera
R - flip car
K - repair
N - next car
B - slow motion

On mobile devices ‚Äî use on-screen buttons.

games.title: Turbo Stunt Racing
games.description: Experience high-speed thrills in Turbo Stunt Racing! Perform epic stunts, race fierce rivals, and upgrade unique cars in this 3D arcade racer packed with action, traps, and ramps. Master precision driving and dominate every level!
games.howToPlayText:
Rev your engines and dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of Turbo Stunt Racing! This immersive 3D arcade racing game brings you stylized graphics and non-stop action. Face off against fierce opponents as you race through increasingly challenging levels.

In Turbo Stunt Racing, it‚Äôs not just about speed‚Äîit's about style! Complete daring stunts and master the art of precision driving to earn big rewards. Use your hard-earned cash to upgrade your vehicle or splurge on a brand-new ride, each with unique characteristics and performance boosts.

The levels are packed with dynamic obstacles, traps, and ramps that test your reflexes and racing skills. Navigate through perilous turns and soar over jaw-dropping jumps to stay ahead of the competition.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a racing enthusiast, Turbo Stunt Racing offers a thrilling experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Buckle up, hit the turbo, and prove you're the ultimate racing champion!

Controls:
‚Üë (Up Arrow / W): Accelerate
‚Üì (Down Arrow / S): Decelerate
‚Üê (Left Arrow / A): Steer left
‚Üí (Right Arrow / D): Steer right

games.title: Drifting Car Master
games.description:
Rush into the world of speed, adrenaline and dangerous turns! üî•

Welcome to Drifting Car Master ‚Äî an extreme racing game where every turn is a challenge and every meter is a fight for leadership!

üèéÔ∏è Compete with the best drifters around the world! Take part in exciting races on open tracks, where only skill, precise timing and a perfectly balanced skid will bring victory.

But be careful ‚Äî the police are always there! On the highway, it's not just speed that rules, but also risk. Patrols are hunting for those who are too fast cutting through the streets. Can you get away from the chase? Or will the cops catch you sooner?

, Game Features:

- Arcade physics and controls for perfect drift
- A variety of cars
- Dynamic chases with the police
- Car upgrade and customization to suit your style

Are you ready to win at any cost ‚Äî even if you have to evade the law?

W - Gas
A,D - Turn the car

games.title: TRAFFIC JAM ESCAPE 3D
games.description:
Clear the roads in Traffic Jam Escape 3D! Solve challenging traffic puzzles, free cars from gridlock, and master the art of strategic driving.

Get ready to play Traffic Jam Escape 3D, the addictive mobile traffic puzzle game where you control chaotic city streets and free cars from gridlock! Every second counts - one smart move can clear the road, one mistake can block it forever. Are you skilled enough to guide every car out of the jam?

In Traffic Jam Escape 3D, your goal is simple but challenging: tap cars, follow the arrows, and plan their path to freedom. Avoid collisions, dodge obstacles, and keep traffic moving smoothly. With each level, timing and strategy become even more important - one wrong move could create a crash and block the way.

Every stage offers a brand-new challenge. You‚Äôll need to think ahead, plan the order of moves, and figure out the best escape route for each vehicle. From narrow alleys to busy intersections, the puzzles get tougher and more exciting as you progress.

Featuring a wide variety of vehicles - from tiny cars to large trucks - you‚Äôll need to adapt your strategy to guide each one safely out of the mess. The more you play, the sharper your skills become as you conquer increasingly complex traffic jams.

Key Features of Traffic Jam Escape 3D:
Challenging traffic jam escape puzzles at every level
Intuitive tap-and-guide controls for all ages
Dynamic gameplay with busy intersections, narrow roads, and tricky obstacles
Dozens of levels with increasing difficulty to keep you hooked
Vibrant graphics and realistic sound effects for an immersive experience
Traffic Jam Escape isn‚Äôt just about clearing the streets‚Äîit‚Äôs about mastering the art of smart maneuvering. Dodge oncoming traffic, weave through tight spaces, and avoid obstacles at every turn. With dozens of levels to conquer, the game offers a constant challenge and endless fun.

Whether you‚Äôre solving quick car escape puzzles on the go or tackling more complex jam-packed streets at home, Traffic Jam Escape 3D delivers nonstop excitement and tests your problem-solving skills.

Ready to test your reflexes and strategic thinking? Take the driver‚Äôs seat in Traffic Jam Escape 3D today and see if you can clear the roads and guide every car to safety. Play now and experience the thrill of escaping the traffic jams!
games.howToPlayText: Tap cars to drive them out and clear the traffic jam! Collect gems to decorate your room, finish levels fast for more points, and use boosters like rockets or helicopters to beat tough stages.

games.howToPlayText:
This is an exciting puzzle game in which you have to drive buses in brightly colored parking lots, solving complex problems and helping passengers find their cars.

The aim of the game is to match cars with passengers and clear the parking lot. 
The car moves away in the direction of the arrow if you click on it. 
The car's path must be free, otherwise it will not be able to leave the parking lot. 
If there are difficulties you can always use the queue sorting and car shuffling boosters.

games.description:
üööVan Rush!üì¶
Drive, pass puzzle, deliver deliveries, load packages, earn money and buy offers.
games.howToPlayText:
‚ö†Ô∏èAttention‚ö†Ô∏è
Recomended to play in fullscreen.

You can change cursor vibility state by pressing "C" it helps to switch fast between selecting order and driving van.
 

‚ö†Ô∏èTutorial‚ö†Ô∏è
Drive van to the orange platform and wait 3 seconds, after that loading puzzle will open, after finishing puzlle press Finish and deliveries will appear in the deliveries menu, click on the delivery to take. After taking delivery on map will appear green circle that's the place where you need to deliver package, package can be took from the van back.

üéÆControlsüéÆ

W/A/S/D - Movement

W/A/S/D - Car Controls

Space - Brake

E - Take Package

E - Deliver Package

M - Open/Close big map

O - Open/Close offers menu

C - Change Cursor Visibility

Tab - Open/Close Deliveries Menu

Esc - Pause

games.title: Clash of Cars: Arena
games.description:
Welcome to the arena where the weak don‚Äôt survive!

Take the wheel of a legendary, heavily armed Hot Rod and challenge dozens of ruthless opponents.

Here, there are no rules ‚Äî only speed, firepower, and your reflexes decide who becomes the champion. Blast enemies with precise shots, collect stars, and unlock powerful upgrades for your battle beast.

Swap weapons, reinforce your armor, hit top speed, and leave nothing but smoke and wreckage behind!

Every arena is a new challenge, where only those willing to take risks can claim victory.

Ready to prove you‚Äôre the king of the road? Then hit the gas and race toward glory!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:

Desktop:
W, A, S, D ‚Äî move your car
Shift ‚Äî nitro boost
V ‚Äî jump
R ‚Äî use ability

Mobile:
Movement: Left stick (up, down, left, right)
Ability: Icon in the bottom center of the screen
Brake, Jump, Nitro Boost ‚Äî buttons on the bottom right

Goal:
Destroy your opponents to take the lead and become the king of the arena! Use your weapons wisely ‚Äî blow up enemies, trap them, and don‚Äôt give them a chance to fight back. One wrong move, and your car turns into a pile of scrap metal!

games.title: Buggy Simulator Sandbox 3D
games.description: Buggy Simulator Sandbox 3D is a buggy physics simulator, ride on various maps and observe the behavior of cars and their wheels. There are several cars to choose from - you can switch between them at any time and control any one. Explore the map with the city and the bridge, jump over the hills, drive off the bridge. On the test zone, you can destroy the pyramids, evaluate the work of the suspension and more.
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
"WASD" - driving/steering
"SPACE" - handbrake
"C" - change camera
"Shift" - nitro
"R" - reset car
"N" - next car
"Tab" - menu
The rest is through the game interface.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.

The goal of the game: just ride as you like ;)

games.title: Russian Drift: Overtaking in the City
games.description: Experience the thrill of Russian Drift: Overtaking in the City‚Äîan intense street racing game with realistic physics, stunning graphics, and adrenaline-fueled drifts. Overtake rivals, master your skills, and dominate the competition. Ready to become a legend?
games.howToPlayText:
W - Gas
A,D - Turn the car
S - Brake
To control the car on your mobile phone, use the buttons on the phone screen.

games.title: Car Parking Order
games.description:
Car parking order game to test your brainpower and skills in this remarkable puzzle game. Unlock new levels of traffic jam game by strategically guiding the cars in the correct way and prepare for an exhilarating journey ahead. With each parking challenge, you'll find yourself fully immersed in this delightful and engaged game.

Navigate through unique parking lots by avoiding obstacles and overcoming various traffic jam hurdles in your way. From parking jam situations to unexpected roadblocks, every parking order level presents a new and exciting test of your parking abilities. Take on the role of a skilled driver and masterfully park your cars to their designated spots without a hitch. But be aware, as even the slightest miscalculation can lead to failure.
games.howToPlayText:
1. Plan your moves strategically to park each car in the correct order.
2. Earn stars based on your performance and unlock new levels.
3. Examine the puzzle layout and study each car's characteristics.
4. Challenge yourself with increasing levels of difficulty.

games.title: Dronner 3D
games.description: Dronner 3D - Immerse yourself in dynamic racing in a unique car that can turn into a quadcopter and overcome exciting tracks.
games.howToPlayText:
Dronner 3D - Immerse yourself in dynamic racing in a unique car that can turn into a quadcopter and overcome exciting tracks. 

Collect points and battery charges, avoid collisions that are especially dangerous in quadcopter mode, and monitor damage status and battery charge levels. 

As you progress through levels, upgrade your car by increasing battery capacity and repairing damage. At the end of each level you will find a table with statistics where you can evaluate your achievements.

Desktop Controls:

1. Movement on the ground:
‚Üë (Up Arrow) or W : Move forward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow) or W : Move back.
‚Üê (Left Arrow) or A : Move left.
‚Üí (Right Arrow) or D : Move right.

2. Switching modes:
Spacebar: Transform the machine into a quadcopter and back.

3. Air control:
‚Üë (Up Arrow) or W : Move forward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow) or W : Move back.
‚Üê (Left Arrow) or A : Move left.
‚Üí (Right Arrow) or D : Move right.
Q: Move upward.
E: Move downward.

games.title: Driverz Ed
games.description:
Welcome to Driverz Ed, with your instructor Ed! Explore Ed's beautiful island, completing challenges, or just drive around and try to find all the secrets the Island has to offer!

Find the hidden Puzzle Pieces and unlock every car.
games.howToPlayText:
Explore the world, find the hidden Puzzle Pieces, unlock every car.

Controls:
WASD to Move
Arrows to Move
Mouse to Control the Camera.

G - Fast Travel to Start of Races
M - Shows all available missions and current records
P - Pause and open settings

games.title: Car Escape
games.description:
Car Escape - an exhilarating and thrilling traffic escape game that prepares you for every pulse-pounding adventure. Every step counts, and every action can spell the difference between freedom and gridlock. Can you maneuver your car out of the traffic jam and break free?

Start the engine, press the accelerator, and prepare to escape the chaotic and congested streets. But don't be afraid; with your quick reflexes and sharp intellect, you'll soon master the art of navigating through traffic.
games.howToPlayText:
Navigate through the traffic escape scenarios and assess whether each vehicle's path is clear based on the arrows displayed. Find the optimal route for each vehicle.
- Tap the car gently to move it in the direction indicated by the arrow. Guide each vehicle to flee the congested area.
- Strategically select the order of vehicle movements to avoid collisions with other vehicles on the route. Carefully plan the sequence of vehicles to ensure smooth and seamless traffic flow.
Ôªø

games.title: Parking Master: Urban Challenges
games.description: Explore the dynamic environment of city driving in "Parking Master: Urban Challenges," an engaging 3D simulation that hones your parking skills. Maneuver through complex urban settings with lifelike vehicles, ideal for anyone looking to improve their driving abilities on mobile or desktop platforms.
games.howToPlayText:
Your task is to park the car in a certain area without getting into an accident and doing it as quickly as possible. Follow the arrows to find a parking space. The progress is saved when the level is completed. To go to the next level, you need to pass the previous one.  

WASD or arrows ‚Äî movement and rotation of the car. 
The space bar is the handbrake. 
E or ~ ‚Äî open the game menu. 
M ‚Äî switch the camera.

games.title: Parking Boom
games.description:
Parking Boom is a fun and addictive physics-based game where your goal is to launch your car straight into the parking spot!
Adjust the power and angle, smash through other vehicles along the way, and try to land as accurately as possible.

Each level offers unique obstacles and creative challenges that make your ride exciting and unpredictable.
Sharpen your parking skills, beat level after level, and aim for perfection in this fast-paced and explosive adventure.

With a variety of cars, dynamic stages, and tons of destruction, Parking Boom turns every parking attempt into a chaotic thrill ride!
If you're looking for something fresh, loud, and action-packed, Parking Boom will drive you into a world where crashing is half the fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Aim Your Car
Adjust the angle, direction and power using the mouse or touching the screen.

Launch and Crash
Release to launch your car. Smash through other vehicles as you fly toward the parking spot.

Park Accurately
Try to land your car inside the highlighted parking zone.

games.title: Cars
games.description: Become a car driver in this thrilling online racing game! Overtake vehicles, avoid crashes, and race to beat your high score. Tap gas or brake to master the road and show your best result. Play now for fast-paced driving fun!
games.howToPlayText: In this game you will become a car driver! Press the gas to overtake cars, and brake to avoid crashing, and so pass as many cars as possible and show your best result in this race!

games.title: Bouncy Motors
games.description:
Driving a car that bounces like jelly, you need to get to the finish line.
Beware of red zones - wheels fall off on impact! 
Also be careful when driving on ice!
games.howToPlayText:
Drive forward: W or ‚Üë or left stick (mobile)
Drive backward: S or ‚Üì or left stick (mobile)

Rotate counterclockwise: A or ‚Üê or right stick (on mobile)
Rotate clockwise: D or ‚Üí or right stick (mobile)
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/bouncy-motors?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Crash Control
games.description: Experience the thrilling challenge of managing traffic in Crash Control. This free online game tests your ability to maintain order at busy intersections with easy one-tap controls and impressive 3D graphics. Can you ensure safety amidst growing complexities? Jump into the action and discover your skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Tap on a car to stop or start it.
Avoid crashes by managing traffic flow at intersections and train crossings.
Trains cannot stop, so time your moves wisely!
Complete levels to unlock even more challenging traffic scenarios.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/crash-control?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Fun Town Parking
games.description: Experience the excitement of **Fun Town Parking**, a dynamic parking simulation that challenges your driving skills. Maneuver through tricky paths and secure parking spots while dodging obstacles. As you advance, the difficulty escalates, refining your abilities. Can you park flawlessly in this thrilling challenge?
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard
Move - W/A/S/D or Arrow keys
Change Gear - Shift gears to move forward or backward
Camera - C to toggle camera view
Mute - M to mute/unmute sound
Pause - P to pause the game
Reset - R to reset the game

games.title: Bobr turbo: craft cars
games.description:
Dive into a world where imagination meets destruction! In this action-packed builder game, your mission is clear: create, upgrade, and dominate. Construct powerful battle machines from a wide variety of blocks, customize them to your style, craft new parts, and prove your engineering skills in intense arena showdowns.

üí° Create Your Own War Machines

With an arsenal of blocks, boosters, and weapons at your fingertips, design machines that are as deadly as they are unique. Upgrade your parts to make your builds tougher, faster, and more destructive!

üõ†Ô∏è Craft, Customize, Compete

Collect loot from chests to enhance your arsenal and push your creativity to the limit. Fine-tune your machines to outperform the competition!

üî• Outsmart and outbuild your rivals. Wreck your enemies in spectacular auto-battles and rise to the top. Only the best engineers will claim victory!

Are you ready for the challenge? Prove your skills, show off your creativity, and become the ultimate battle machine builder!
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to collect a fighting machine from inventory blocks. Controls: PC - left mouse button, phone - touch the screen.
Fighting takes place automatically.

games.title: Stunsteval Siderollers
games.description: STUNSTEVAL SIDEROLLERS is an arcade race with a side view. Try to outrun a helicopter, a biplane or a fighter jet. Drive in the rain or on a dark highway.
games.howToPlayText:
PC control:
D - forward
Double-tap D to lower the gear
A - back
W - gear up
S - gear low
The control on the phone is carried out using the arrows.

games.title: Hot Rods Arena Stars
games.description:
Welcome to the arena where the weak don‚Äôt survive!

Take the wheel of a legendary, heavily armed Hot Rod and challenge dozens of ruthless opponents.

Here, there are no rules ‚Äî only speed, firepower, and your reflexes decide who becomes the champion. Blast enemies with precise shots, collect stars, and unlock powerful upgrades for your battle beast.

Swap weapons, reinforce your armor, hit top speed, and leave nothing but smoke and wreckage behind!

Every arena is a new challenge, where only those willing to take risks can claim victory.

Ready to prove you‚Äôre the king of the road? Then hit the gas and race toward glory!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
W, A, S, D ‚Äî drive your car

Mobile:
Movement ‚Äî use the left stick (up, down, left, right)

Goal:
Collect stars to outscore your rivals. Use your weapons wisely ‚Äî blow up enemies, trap them, and don‚Äôt give them a chance to strike back. One mistake, and your car becomes scrap metal!

games.title: Roots and Wheels
games.description:
This exciting simulator presents you with an ambitious task: get behind the wheel of a powerful truck and transport as many crates as possible through dangerous and unpredictable locations to your destination.


Success depends on your skill‚Äîyour ability to feel the vehicle and react to road conditions‚Äîand your wits‚Äîyour ability to find the best solutions in difficult situations, whether it's mud, steep climbs, or destroyed bridges. Every box delivered brings you closer to your reward.


By earning money for completed trips, you get the opportunity to upgrade your truck ‚Äì from the engine to the suspension to the wheels ‚Äì and better equip it for the challenges of the terrain.


You can also buy new vehicle models, expanding your options and gaining access to new types of missions and cargo. Show what a real driver can do!

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
games.howToPlayText:
Get behind the wheel of the powerful military Ural in this exciting simulation game! The driver of the military Ural challenges you not just to drive, but to deliver valuable cargo skillfully. Your task is to drive through complex tracks and bring to the finish line as many boxes as possible, using your agility to maneuver and wit to find the best solutions in difficult situations off-road.

The controls are intuitive, whether you're playing on your phone or computer. On mobile devices you control the movement with touch pedals: right - forward, left - backward. On the computer you use the keys: D for forward and A for backward.

Earn money. Invest it in improvements for your machines. Or save up to buy new cars - each with its own unique capabilities, ready for the most extreme tests. Expand your fleet, improve your skills and become the best off-road driver!

games.title: Bridge Builder
games.description:
Become a design engineer who will have to improvise and, above all, adapt to the task at hand. Use different materials to build structures that can support the weight of the vehicle.

Game Features:

- Excellent physics - a real simulator
- Challenging levels in four different locations
- Challenging puzzles requiring the use of thinking and logic
- Built-in hint system will help you develop your skills
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop controls: 
Drag left click = build a bridge
Space = start simulation
Z = undo
Double left click to remove a bridge part

Mobile controls:
Use touchscreen and on-screen controls
